name: J.U.M.P.
description:
The J.U.M.P video game is a Free to Play mobile, story-driven rhythm game with gacha elements.

The project is being developed by the indie studio Night Coffee Studio LLC based in Moscow, Russia.

J.U.M.P is a unique project in its genre. It combines both the best consumer qualities of rhythm games: the opportunity to feel like a real musician, enjoy high-quality music tracks and escape from the daily grind, as well as the competitive advantages of story-driven games: an interesting setting, extraordinary characters, a variety of locations. 

J.U.M.P tells the story of a team of animals figuring out how to work together and save the world using their jumping talents from an Evil power about to awaken.

The player has to get through “musical maps”, long vertical levels constantly moving downwards with specifically located objects – the notes. While listening to the rhythm of the musical track, the player touches the screen in certain places with a certain timing in order to hit the notes and move further along the level (map).

The game is planned for distribution on the Free to Play model with a monetization system through the in-game store, where you can purchase new characters, maps and tracks, as well as commercial reels.
